entry.title: Electrical engineer interview questions
entry.dc:subject: Hardware
entry.summary: What types of CMOS memories have you designed? What were their size? Speed? Configuration Process technology? What work have you done on full chip Clock and Power distribution? What process technology and budgets were used? What types of I/O have you designed? What were their size? Speed? Configuration? Voltage requirements? Process technology? What package was used and [...]

entry.title: Sysadmin interview questions
entry.dc:subject: Windows
Unix/Linux
entry.summary:
What is a level 0 backup? What is an incremental backup? What steps are required to perform a bare-metal recovery? Name key files or directories on a UNIX system that should always be backed up. Name key files or directories on a Windows system that should always be backed up.
What is RAID 0? What is RAID 0+1? Why is it [...]

entry.title: Network developer interview questions
entry.dc:subject: Networking
Unix/Linux
Web dev
entry.summary:
What ports does FTP traffic travel over? What ports does mail traffic utilize? What ports do HTTP and HTTPS use? Why is NTP required in an NFS network?
Name some common mal software on the server side What is CPAN? How do you access it? What is PEAR? What advantages does mod_perl have over a perl CGI? What is required to do SSL [...]

entry.title: MySQL and general database interview questions
entry.dc:subject: Unix/Linux
Database
entry.summary:
What is MySQL? What is Postgres? What are the basic steps in setting up an Oracle system? What is a stored procedure, and which databases support it? What is RMAN?
What is the TDS protocol? What is required to connect to an oracle system remotely? In MySQL, how do I create a database? In MySQL, how do I grant access to a user [...]

entry.title: Security interview questions for network admin
entry.dc:subject: Networking
entry.summary:
What is a firewall? Describe, genrally, how to manage a firewall What is a Denial of Service attack? What is a “spoofed” packet?
What is a SYN Flood? What do you do if you are a victim of a DoS? What is GPG/PGP? What is SSH? What is SSL? How do you create certificates? What would you do if you discovered a UNIX or [...]
